title: Bitcoin Price Prediction 2030
description: Since the early days, the bitcoin story has been one of highs and lows. However, not too dissimilar to other riskier assets, the general trend has been upwards, with bitcoin printing new highs while avoiding new lows. In December 2017, BTC struck a high of $19,871. A year-long bull run, driven by a hot ICO market, saw BTC surge from a January low of $740.
